title: Inconsistent line-height on soft-breaks following an emoji
description:
### Summary

Paragraph line-height is too large in lines following a soft break (`  `) if there is an emoji in the previous line.


### Steps to reproduce

* Add an emoji inline in a Markdown paragraph
* Add a soft-break (two trailing spaces) 
* Add additional text

### Example

This very issue should serve as an example.  
Line height correct

This very issue should serve as an example :blush:.  
Line height too high

### Screeny

![Screen_Shot_2018-06-15_at_11.26.14_PM](/uploads/4cc2f5d91c2415f52877875f8ce5fb2b/Screen_Shot_2018-06-15_at_11.26.14_PM.png)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

* Line height is too large in this condition

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

* There should be no difference between emoji/no emoji in previous line

~bootstrap4 label is an assumption!
